name: Jakub Chudik
headline: Great for networking, excellent expertise.
testimonial: I joined TechFellows as a young founder, looking for community where I could find understanding and advise for the technical and leadership challenges I was facing. TechFellows provided me with a platform to brainstorm with more experienced engineering leaders and create deep connections. This has been invaluable!

name: Tomáš Halgaš
headline: Dynamic Community for Engineering Leaders in CEE
testimonial: I was very pleased to learn about TechFellows, which is building an amazing community of engineering managers and leaders in our CEE region. I have been to their events as a speaker and as a visitor, and TechFellows is doing great work to share experiences between successful engineering managers.
